summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MIR4 Account Tracker - Legendary Resources feature. All 25 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified all new features: navigation to resources page via trophy button, 8 resource input fields, inline editing with auto-save, progress calculation by bottleneck, 'Mais Próximo' identification, and back navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: LegendaryResources model correctly added to backend with all 8 resource fields
Progress calculation uses bottleneck (minimum) approach correctly
Inline editing saves on blur without page reload
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
API correctly returns legendary_resources in GET responses
seed_data_creation: Test account 'Conta Teste Lendário' exists with resources: aco_lendario=200, esfera_lendaria=80, lunar_lendario=60
context_for_next_testing_agent: Legendary Resources feature fully implemented and tested. Navigation via trophy button in main table. Resources page at /account/:accountId/resources shows 'Meus Recursos' (8 inputs) and 'Objetivos Lendários' (3 objectives with progress bars). Progress calculated by bottleneck method. Inline editing auto-saves on blur.

backend: GET /api/accounts - Returns all accounts with legendary_resources
Default legendary_resources (all zeros) when not provided
Progress calculation verification for Arma (300 Aço, 100 Esfera, 100 Lunar)
Progress calculation verification for Torso (300 Aço, 100 Quintessência, 100 Bugiganga)
Progress calculation verification for Colar (300 Platina, 100 Iluminado, 100 Anima)
frontend: Trophy button in main table navigates to resources page
Resources page displays account name correctly
Inline editing of resources saves on blur without reload
'Mais Próximo' block shows closest objective (Arma at 60%)
All 3 objectives displayed with progress bars
Progress percentages calculated correctly by bottleneck
